Articles.Content: Hey so I have been playing this game for a couple weeks and it just malfunctioned on me causing the bar to not move at all so I think the problem is that I am missing a file in my KSP folder and I was wondering if anyone can post a screenshot of the folder so i can figure out if that is the issue.

Missing files generally won't do this, but there's one way to be sure. Load up KSP, and when it halts (or before), hit Alt+F2 to bring up the debug logger. Post a copy of whatever error it's showing, and we'll see what we can do.

(I figure that's considerably easier than looking through screenshots for a while. There are a lot of files in KSP's stock installation, after all.)

You can also check the thread below, which will point you at the log files. Posting one of those can help us get a better idea of what your issue might be.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide

Welcome to the forums!

~Claw
